events.name: menu-item:click
events.description: Fires the event when custom menu item is clicked.

returns.description: The DOM cell.
returns.name: ZGData.DOMCell

returns.description: The relevant DOM cell.
returns.name: ZGData.cell

returns.description: The full data object for the row.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: ZGData.fieldIndex

returns.description: Reference to the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.grid

returns.description: The relevant header.
returns.name: ZGData.header

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: ZGData.recordIndex

events.dependency: The 'menu:click' event listener must be added to the custom menu item.

events.name: grid:beforerender
events.description: Fires the event once before the grid renders.

events.name: grid:columnmove
events.description: Fires the event when a column is moved to a frozen spot or within a fram

returns.description: The fieldIndex of the moved column
returns.name: ZGData.fieldIndex

returns.description: The old numerical index of the moved column
returns.name: ZGData.oldIndex

returns.description: The new numerical index of the moved column
returns.name: ZGData.newIndex

returns.description: The frozen state of the moved column
returns.name: ZGData.frozen

events.dependency: The `column-drag` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag or `frozen` needs to be enabled

events.name: grid:columntogglevisiblity
events.description: Fires the event when a column is hidden or shown

returns.description: The fieldIndex of the moved column
returns.name: ZGData.fieldIndex

returns.description: Indicates if the column is hidden
returns.name: ZGData.hidden

events.dependency: The `columns-control` or `column-drag` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag

events.name: grid:contextmenuclose
events.description: Fires the  event when the contextmenu is closed.
events.dependency: The `context-menu` or `static-menu` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:contextmenuopen
events.description: Fires the event when the contextmenu is opened.
events.dependency: The `context-menu` or `static-menu` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:deselect
events.description: Fires the event when selection is deselected in the grid.
events.dependency: The `selector` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:hydrate
events.description: Fires the event when the pre-rendered grid is finished being hydrated.
events.dependency: The `server-rendered` attribute is required on pre-rendered `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:keydownesc
events.description: Fires the event when the (Esc) key is pressed.

events.name: grid:pagechange
events.description: Fires the event when a page changes in the grid.

returns.description: The current page index.
returns.name: ZGData.currentPage

returns.description: The current `page-size` of the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.pageSize

events.dependency: The `pager` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:pagefirst
events.description: Fires the event when the grid changes to the first page.

returns.description: The current page index.
returns.name: ZGData.currentPage

returns.description: The current `page-size` of the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.pageSize

events.dependency: The `pager` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:pagelast
events.description: Fires the event when the grid changes to the last page.

returns.description: The current page index.
returns.name: ZGData.currentPage

returns.description: The current `page-size` of the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.pageSize

events.dependency: The `pager` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:pagenext
events.description: Fires the event when the grid changes to the next page.

returns.description: The current page index.
returns.name: ZGData.currentPage

returns.description: The current `page-size` of the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.pageSize

events.dependency: The `pager` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:pageprev
events.description: Fires the event when the grid changes to the previous page.

returns.description: The current page index.
returns.name: ZGData.currentPage

returns.description: The current `page-size` of the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.pageSize

events.dependency: The `pager` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:pagesizechange
events.description: Fires the event when the `page-size` (amount of rows displaying) changes on the grid.

returns.description: The current page index.
returns.name: ZGData.currentPage

returns.description: The old `page-size` of the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.oldPageSize

returns.description: The current `page-size` of the grid.
returns.name: ZGData.pageSize

events.dependency: The `pager` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:ready
events.description: Fires the grid ready event when grid is ready.

events.name: grid:refresh
events.description: Fires the event when the grid is refreshed through grid controls or API method `refresh()`.

events.name: grid:render
events.description: Fires the event once when grid renders.

events.name: grid:scroll
events.description: Fires the event when scrolling occurs in grid.

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

events.dependency: Require the `height` attribute on the `zing-grid` tag to enable scrolling.

events.name: grid:search
events.description: Fires the event when a the grid is searched.

returns.description: The current search term.
returns.name: ZGData.searchTerm

returns.description: The Array of search results
returns.name: ZGData.searchResults

returns.description: The length of the search results
returns.name: ZGData.searchCount

events.dependency: The `search` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:select
events.description: Fires the event when selection is made in the grid.

returns.description: The column where the selection ends.
returns.name: ZGData.columnEnd

returns.description: The column where the selection starts.
returns.name: ZGData.columnStart

returns.description: A string for a single cell and array for multiple cells being selected.
returns.name: ZGData.selectedData

returns.description: The row where the selection ends.
returns.name: ZGData.rowEnd

returns.description: The row where the selection starts.
returns.name: ZGData.rowStart

returns.description: The single selected cell.  If multiple cells are selected, this will have the first one.  Use cells to access the rest.
returns.name: ZGData.DOMCell

returns.description: An array of the selected cells.  If only one cell is selected, it is still in an array.
returns.name: ZGData.DOMCells

events.dependency: The `selector` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:selectall
events.description: Fires the event when selecting every cell (ctrl+a) in the grid.
events.dependency: The `selector` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: grid:sort
events.description: Fires the event when a the grid is sorted

returns.description: The index of the sorted column
returns.name: ZGData.fieldIndex

returns.description: Which direction the index is sorted
returns.name: ZGData.order

events.dependency: The `sort` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: cell:beforerender
events.description: Fires the event before a cell is rendered.

returns.description: The numerical index of the column.
returns.name: ZGData.columnIndex

returns.description: The full data object for the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The DOM cell.
returns.name: ZGData.DOMCell

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: ZGData.fieldIndex

returns.description: The numerical index of the row.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

events.name: cell:click
events.description: Fires the event when a click occurs to a cell.

returns.description: The relevant DOM cell.
returns.name: ZGData.DOMCell

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: ZGData.fieldIndex

returns.description: The column position index.
returns.name: ZGData.columnIndex

returns.description: The current row index.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

returns.description: The current record index.
returns.name: ZGData.recordIndex

returns.description: The column type (default is text).
returns.name: ZGData.type

returns.description: The value of the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.value

returns.description: A reference to the custom ZingGrid internal event.
returns.name: ZGEvent

returns.description: A reference to the DOM element.
returns.name: ZGTarget

events.name: cell:closeedit
events.description: Fires the event when the cell editor is closed.

returns.description: If the user canceled instead of saving the cell edit.
returns.name: ZGData.canceled

returns.description: The numerical index of the column.
returns.name: ZGData.columnIndex

returns.description: The full data object for the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.data

returns.description: The DOM cell.
returns.name: ZGData.DOMCell

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: ZGData.fieldIndex

returns.description: The new value of the cell after editing.
returns.name: ZGData.newValue

returns.description: The numerical index of the row.
returns.name: ZGData.rowIndex

events.dependency: The `editor` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: cell:copy
events.description: Fires the event when copying (ctrl+c) occurs in a cell.

returns.description: The data copied from the cell.
returns.name: ZGData.data

events.dependency: The `selector` attribute is required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:cell:beforechange
events.description: Fires the event before a single cell value is changed.

returns.description: The DOM cell that was updated.
returns.name: DOMCell

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: fieldIndex

returns.description: The new value of the cell.
returns.name: newValue

returns.description: The old value of the cell.
returns.name: oldValue

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:cell:change
events.description: Fires the event after a single cell value is changed.

returns.description: The DOM cell that was updated.
returns.name: DOMCell

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The column index e.g. "firstName".
returns.name: fieldIndex

returns.description: The new value of the cell.
returns.name: newValue

returns.description: The old value of the cell.
returns.name: oldValue

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:load
events.description: Fires the event every time a new dataset is loaded in the grid.

events.name: data:record:beforechange
events.description: Fires the event before a record (row) is changed.

returns.description: The column indices that were changed e.g. ["firstName","lastName"].
returns.name: changedField

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The old data object associated with that record.
returns.name: oldData

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:record:beforedelete
events.description: Fires the event before a record (row) is deleted from the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:record:beforeinsert
events.description: Fires the event before a new record (row) is added to the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:record:change
events.description: Fires the event after a record (row) is changed.

returns.description: The column indices that were changed e.g. ["firstName","lastName"].
returns.name: changedField

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The old data object associated with that record.
returns.name: oldData

returns.description: The unique identifier for the row, this identifier never changes.
returns.name: recordIndex

returns.description: The index of the row.
returns.name: rowIndex

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:record:delete
events.description: Fires the event when a record (row) is deleted from the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.

events.name: data:record:insert
events.description: Fires the event after a new record (row) is added to the grid.

returns.description: The data object associated with that record.
returns.name: data

returns.description: The index of the row.

events.dependency: The `editor` or `editor-controls` attribute(s) are required on the `zing-grid` tag.
